message: Let's split it evenly to start. Your turn!
You're being too generous, I'll take more this time!
You think you're getting a good deal? I'll do better than that!
I'll give you a bigger share, but don't think you're getting away with it that easily!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
Not yet, Bob. I've got a few tricks up my sleeve!
I'm not getting desperate, just strategic. You're not getting all the cake, Bob!
You're playing a tough game, but I'm not backing down!
I'm not backing down either, Bob. Bring it on!
I'm not getting squeezed out, Bob. I'll give you a decent share, but I need some breathing room!
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't expect me to go easy on you now!
You think you're in control, Bob? I've got a few tricks left up my sleeve!
I'm not out of options yet, Bob. You might want to reconsider!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you get the better of me now!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I'll make one final stand!
This is my last chance, Bob. I'm going for broke!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Fine, Bob. You win this time. But I'm not going down without a fight!
